div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene Tenta in preto
rio eiusdem decimo tercio die mensis Octobris Anno quo supra

Eodem die Walterus baxstar conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore Johannis coli
sone prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Robertj farland Et Idem Robertus conuictus
fuit pro perturbio dictj Walterj Et quilibet alterj emendabit ut Jura
volunt

The said day Dauid treis follouit Johne of mar for the wranguis' takin
and haldin fra him of thre schilling and iiij d' quhilkis the said Johne'
denyit offering him tile vnderly the desicioun' of ane assis' And'
Incontinent thareftir the said actioun' was put to the decisione of thir
personis vnder writin Johnne colisone Duncane colisone William'
Wormet thomas Waus mathow branch' Dauid fynne Richerde
Waus Johnne malisone James strathachin henry Reid' Johne
auchnef Dauy Adamsone Johne Waus Johne thomsoune
and Williame Kintor burges of the said burgh' quhilkis the gret
bodely aitht suorne the Richtis resonis and allegacionis of baitht
the said partiis herd sein considerit and vnderstandin deliuerit
and fand the said Johne of mar quyt of the wranguis'
takin and withthalding of the said' money

The said day Ebe Ranesone the wif of James strathachin was
conuict' be ane suorne assis' Dauid menyeis forspekar for the
Selling of xij d' aill Incontrar the statutis of the toune for
the quhilk scho was in ane amerciament of the court and to Amend'
as law wile and forbeir in tyme to cum

The said day the said Ebe Ranesone was conuict be the said assis'
Dauid menyes forspekar for the wranguis' selling of aill within hir
hous' ande wile nocht sele It in the toune as scho that is ane commone
broustar for the quhilki scho was in ane amerciament of the court et cetera

The said day the said Ebe Ranesone was conuict be said assis'
Dauid menyeis forspekar' for the Selling of bettir aill in the hous'
thane scho dois in the toune for the quhilkis scho was in ane amer
ciament of the court et cetera

The said day Ebe Raneson was conuict be the said assis' for the
Selling of aile to perticular folkis in the toune and nocht tile vtheris
as scho that is ane commone broustar for the quhilkis scho was
in ane Amerciament of the Court and to Amend as law
will et cetera

The said day the said Ebe Ranesone was conuict be the said'
assis' for the brekin of Commone ordinance in the non fulfilling'
and kepin of the statutis of the toune for the quhilkis scho was
in ane amerciament of the court and to Amend as law wile et cetera

Eodem die Wlllelmus Jenor conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore Dauid
menyeis pro perturbio Willelmum scrimgeor in execucione suj officij cuj
emendabit Jura volunt

The said day Donald' baxstar prewit sufficiently that the pot
of vmquhill gilbert Riburnis lyis him in wed' of xvijo s

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvijo
die mensis Octobris anno quo supra

The said day Alexander lammyntoun' flessar was quyt be ane
suorn' assis' Dauid steuart forspekar for ane meir clamyt be henry
laisk

The saide day Thomas lesly come souerte to henry laisk for the
pament of thretty schillingis for ane meir bocht fra the said Duncan'
henry be Wille Duncan to be pair at thir termes that is to say
tene schillingis at sanct Dunstaine day nixt heireftir vthir tene
schillingis at the fest of vphalyday nixt thareftir Ande vthir tene
schillingis at the fest of candylmes nixt thareftir

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem tercio
die mensis Nouembris anno quo supra

The said' day the aldirman diuers' of the Counsale and communite orda
nit d the mastir of the knok werk to gif to Dauy steuart
thre li' of money and ane barrele of pik for the quhilkis the
said' Dauy tuk one him to hald' the northt half of thar queir'
wattirticht for ane yer' at his pouer'

The said' day thome buchan Richerd redhed' gilbert tulidef Donald'
baxtar thome straloche be thir avne toung grant Ilkan of thame
was in ane amerciament of the Court for brekin of common ordinance
latting' the toune want bred' in thar' defaltis

Burgensenses et fratres gilde tempore prepositure gilberti menyeis anno Domini Millesimo quingentesimo
quinto

Alexander blinse Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem
gilde prestito Solito Juramento
Johannes frostar Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito Solito
Juramento et Soluto quinque s' in alba bursa
Willelmus Wallace gracia prepositi et consilij recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde quia sponsauit
filiam burgensis prestito Solito Juramento et Soluto quinque s' in alba bursa
Andreas Cantly Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgenseum et fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento
et Soluto v s' in alba bursa
Johannes brakoche recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde Solutis v s'
in alba bursa Ac Soluet xl s' Inde xxtj in manibus et xx s' in
festo penthecostes proximo futuro prestito Solito Juramento
Dauid bannerman filius Alexander bannermen in bogfirlaw recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde Jure paternitatis prestito Juramento soluto v s'
Willelmus laysk gracia prepositi et consilij recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde
prestito Solito Juramento et Soluto v s' in alba bursa
Willelmus lindesay ad Instanciam magistrum Johannis lindesay Recipitur in liberum
burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento
Patricius gordone Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde
prestito Solito Juramento et Solutis v s' in alba bursa
Akexander ruthirfurd' Jure paterno recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito Solito
Juramento et Solutis quinque s' in alba bursa
Willelmus abirdour Jure patern recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito solito Juramento et Johannes Colisone
plegius pro decim s'
Thomas Pyle recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito Solito Juramento et thomas leslie plegius pro decim s'
Alexander buk Recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde et Soluit
suam contribucioni domino Dauid Runseman prestito Solito Juramento
Andreas edindeauche recipitur in liberum burgensem pro x s' Soluto domino Dauid Runseman
Walterus Cullane Jure paterno recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito Solito
Juramento et Soluto v s' in alba bursa
Alexander menyeis recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde Jure paterno prestito Solito Juramento
Soluto v s' in alba bursa
Dauid Waus Recipitur in liberum burgensum Jure paterno prestito Solito Juramento Soluto
v s' in alba bursa

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem quarto
die mensis nouembris anno quo supra

The saide day thir personis follouing was conuict be ane Suorne assis'
thomas leslie forspekar for Selling of aile for viij d' the galloun'
quhilkis was Set be the suorne Cunnaris for vj d' the gallon' In
the first the wif of Johne blak wattirman the wif of Johne sanclar
Marioun' the widew of Androw luchouris the wif of cristy symmer' the
wif of Sandy findelaw the wif of William blinsel the wif
of Will sclatar the wif of Wat mernis and the wif of Androw barkar

The said' day the wif of Alexander talyour was conuict be ane suorne assis'
thomas leslie forspekar for brekin of commone ordinance that scho
sellis nocht hir' ayle to the nychtbouris of the toune quhen thai send'
for the quhilkis scho was in ane amerciament of the Court

The said' day William blinsele for his wif conuict be the said' assis'
thomas leslie forspekar for trubulance of gentilman ane of the
Cunnaris quhen he was cunnand' hir' aile for the quhilkis he was
in ane amerciament of the court

Thir personis was gevin on bile be the officiaris and the Cunnaris
that thar ayle was Set to vj d' the galloun'
the wif Androw beltar' / the wif of Sandy thekar the wif of Johne
balgenschow / the wif of thome barne the wif of Johne
flessour the wif of Johne blak stabillar' the wif of Wille sken'
the wif of gilbert mvresone the wif of gilbert paule the wif of
Williame marnoche the wif of Johne fynne the wif of Sandy
nory the
absentis bessy bisset

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vij die
nouembris anno quo supra

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis assignit this day xv dais to Johne Mali
sone tile ansuer to the bill of Complant directit to thame fra the
lordis of Counsale to minister Justice equaly betuix him and Jonet
Kintor / anent hir coniunctfeftment of ane land' and tua merkis of annuele
takin of the samyn be the said' Johne wranguislie as Is allegit
And to the said' day botht the said partiis consentit that the tennentis
Inhabitan' the said' lande be vnpundit et cetera

The said' day cristy prat oblist him be his handis and gudis to ger'
bring the ayr of vmquhile Dauid prat be xv dais eftir the
fest of Wmydsommer' immediate thareftir Ande falyeing tharof he
sale make leile compt' and Rekning of ale malys fermis of the
landis Croftis and annuellis Rentis pertening to the said' Dauy of
ale termes bigane and to Cum to the ayr or ayris havand' Richt
tharto

Inquisicio facta apud burgum de Aberdene Coram honorabilibus viris gilberto
menyeis preposito Jacobo colisoune Johanne mar Johanne Ratre et Alexandro
gray balliuis dictj burgj in pretorio eiusdem protribunalj sedenti septimo
die mensis nouembris Anno Domini millesimo quingentesimo quinto per sub
scriptum videlicet Alexandrum Reid' thomam Waus alexandrum mar Dauid mar'
georgium bisset henricium Reid' Robertum Waus Dauid Colp Johannem
thomsoune Cristinum prat Jacobum Kennerty thomam menyes et Johannem her
roun' burgenses dictj birgj Qui Juratj dicunt quod dominus Johannes prat
capellanus est propinquior Angnatus Idem est consanguinus ex parte patris
thome prat fratri et heredj quondam Dauid prat ac heredj quondam Willelmum prat
patrj suj Et Idem agnatus accessit etatem vigintj quinque annuorum Et est
sue Rej prouidus Et potens canere ydonne de administracione Rej aliene
Et non est propinquior successurus ipsi thome si ipsum contigent in
fata decidere Datum et clausum Sub Sigillo dictj Jacobi colison' ballivi
Ac Sigillis quorundam quj huic Inquisicionj Intererunt faciendum Anno
die mense et loco prenotatis

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xo
die mensis nouembris anno quosupra

Eodem die Compertum fuit per Inquisicionj Curie quod Willelmus phil
sone est filius et heres quondam Walterj philpsone burgensis dicti
burgi Ideo datum fuit In mandatis Jacobo Colisone balliuo ad cog
noscendum prefatum Willelmum ad terram quondam dicti patris suj ut decet
filium et heredem burgensem cognosci

Eodem die margareta hay sponsa gilberti tulidef conuicta fuit per
assisam Juratam ex ore Johannis Colisone prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio
Normannj leslie seriandi Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt et Idem
Normannus quitus de perturbio prefate margarete

Eodem die margareta Downy conuicta fuit per assisam Iuratam ex
ore Johannis Colisone prelocutoris eiusdem pro iniusta Capcione vnius
ab elizibetht bissat sponsa Willelmum loremar Cuj emendabit
ut Jura volunt et dicta Elizibetht conuicta fuit de perturbio Ipsius
margareta per asisam perlibatam

Curia balliuorum balliuorgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
xiiij die nouembris anno quo supra

Eodem die Dauid Anthone conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore
Dauid menyeis prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio sponse Alexander moresone et
dicta mulier conuicta fuit pro perturbio dicti Anthoni et alter alteri
emendabit ut Jura volunt

The saide day marione auchone megy Downe Ande the wif of
Williame harpar conuict be thar avne toung grant for the brekin of
the actis and Statutis of the tone for makin and Selling of candill
nocht keping the wecht sett be the toune

The saide day the borghe fundin one Williame scrimgeor
officiar be Wat alansone for the wranguis' haldin fra him
of ane pott was fundin of nayn' availe be ane suorne
assis' Dauy menyeis forspekar Ande atour it was deliuerit be
the saide assis' that the said' Williame sale Resaue fra the
said' Walter iij s' and he sal ger' deliuer the saide pott to the
said' Walter quhilkis iij s' the said' Dauy menyeis deliuerit
to the said' Williame

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xiiijto
die nouembris anno quo supra

head.add: Statutum pro emenda farrinam et lagana

div.p:
The saide day It was statutit and ordanit be the aldirman balyeis
ande Counsale for the common' profit of the toune that nay Woman
sal by meile in the merkat bot gif scho mak price of it or
scho gif hir' erllys Ande that thai sale tak nay strakis nor che
riteys' Ande that nay woman salby mair' meile than wile sted'
hir' Self ande hir' houshald' vndir the pane of xl s' Ande that
nay persone baik saile cakis quhill It be diuisit be the aldirman
and Counsale et cetera Ande that ale land mene haue thar sekis
Redy oppin to Sell to ale that wile by vittale boll
demi boll firlot pek and demi partis Ande the tollar' sale haue
firlotis pekis and demi partis Redy to serue ale men et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvij die
mensis nouembris anno quo supra

The saide day Androw lammyntone grauntit him aving to Sandy
nory xxij s' scottis money quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay
within terme of law

The saide day the borghe' fundin one Alexander bannerman duelland
in bogfarlaw be Dauy fynne burges of this burgh for the wrang
uys withhaldin fra him of xxxiij s' and iiij d' was fundin avale
be ane suorne assis' Thomas leslie forspekar et cetera

The saide day the aldirman balyeis Counsale and diuers' of the communite
grauntit ande gaf thar fardinge and keping of thar' Jouelis and
ornamentis of that kirk to sere Dauy Waus chaplane of ale
the said of his lyve with ale deuyteis and profitis pertening tharto
for the keping of the Samyn aucht and wount

head.add: disposicio capellane Sancti ninianj nostro hectorj bois

div.p:
The saide day the aldirman ballieis Counsale and Communite
of the said' burghe' warnit be the hand' bell throwe the hale
toune and be the officiaris of the Samyn gathtreit and Circualie
Inquerit of thar avne fre motiwe and will grauntit and gaf
to mastir hector boeice thar presentacioun' of Sanct Ninianis
altar within the parys kirk of the said' burghe' for ale the dais of
his lywe being at thar gift at this tyme Ande ordanit
to gif thar' commone Seile to seile the said' presentacioun'
The said' day
